scripts.start: static-i18n -l en -i hr -i en ./src/ && cp src/custom.css i18n/ && cp src/app.ts i18n/ && cp src/img/* i18n/img/ && cp -R src/locales/ dist/ && concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "parcel ./i18n/index.html"
scripts.predeployhr: rm -rf dist && cp -R src dist && static-i18n -l hr -i hr -o ./dist ./src/ && parcel build ./dist/index.html --public-url ./ && cp CNAMEhr dist/CNAME && cp -R src/locales/ dist/ && rm -rf ./dist/img/
scripts.predeploy: rm -rf dist && cp -R src dist && static-i18n -l en -i en -o ./dist ./src/ && parcel build ./dist/index.html --public-url ./ && cp CNAME dist/ && cp -R src/locales/ dist/ && rm -rf ./dist/img/
